# 2. Project Topic

Our group has chosen to take on [Mini-Challenge 2: Identify
Patterns](https://vast-challenge.github.io/2023/MC2.html). In this
challenge, The country of Oceanus has sought FishEye International\'s
help in identifying companies possibly engaged in illegal, unreported,
and unregulated (IUU) fishing. Using visual analytics, our team strives
to help identify companies that may be engaged in illegal fishing.
